ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Adventure Stone?
ygData.msgSnippet: The stone is not acqiured in your home city.  You must talk to one of the NPCs in one of the recruiter camps.  Alakazam s has the names of the npcs in each
ygData.messageBody:
The stone is not acqiured in your home city. You must talk to one of the
NPCs in one of the recruiter camps. Alakazam's has the names of the npcs in
each camp that you can talk to to get the stone. You area sked a series of
questions that area about the LDoN expansion.


----Original Message Follows----
From: Nefrahari@...
Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Adventure Stone?
Date: Mon, 6 Oct 2003 07:49:39 EDT

I'm hoping someone can remind me about this... I got the LDoN message about
who to speak to for the adventure stone when I was level 16, and since I
wasn't
at 20 yet, I didn't do it. Now that I'm at 22, I can't remember who it was I
was supposed to talk to. Who is the person in Halas that gives you the
stone?

Jenn

"Sail to your heart's desires, and know when to drop anchor."
